text.section: The clerk of each circuit court shall receive an annual salary of not more than $98,500 as set by the Board of Public Works on the basis of the relative volume of business and receipts in the clerk's office.
A clerk shall devote his full working time to the duties of the clerk's office and is entitled to the salary prescribed in subsection (a) of this section.
The salary of a clerk is payable biweekly.
